summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2798 for the improvement of Sixth Avenue and Seventh Avenue, each from Westlake Avenue to Pine Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with brick or other suitable material, under Ordinance No. 33473, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
